*Mantella jumps to the side and rolls out of the way* Mantella: I was looki=
ng for Quickstrike! *She says as she continues shooting eye lasers at Sines=
is*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 7:53 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  =
Sinesis raises his arms and gets hit in the arm while protecting his face..=
.. "same team as Dark Mouse? the traitor! computer, fire upon dark Mouse wh=
en he arives!...." commands Sinesis.... "now you will pay, worshipper of He=
ll Beast!..." he said, swooping behind Mantella and attempting to roll her =
up in a Schoolboy Pin for some more beating.........
    ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent=
: Friday, May 19, 2000 7:44 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Mante=
lla stares and frowns* Mantella: OOHHH!! THIS IS WHAT I GET FOR COMING TO J=
OIN UP IN THE SAME TEAM THAT DARK MOUSE IS IN!!!!! *She says as she starts =
running while shooting her eye lasers at Sinesis*
      ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: F=
riday, May 19, 2000 7:29 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Sines=
is is knocked down..he laughs.... "nice one you are, but see how you go far=
.....ah! now i'm starting to act like that rhyming bot! yuck!...." he said.=
.....he looked up at tthe autoguns.. "autoguns, target this one!..." he sai=
d, pointing to Mantella.....
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        =
From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday=
, May 19, 2000 7:17 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        *Mante=
lla, Not seeing Senesis gets shot in the back. She climbs to her feet and b=
egins shooting eye lasers at Sinesis*
          ----- Original Message ----=
- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sen=
t: Friday, May 19, 2000 7:08 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


   =
       Sinesis heard someone ask for a job....Hell Beast troop...he thought=
...he walked back around, then popped out firing at Mantella full blast....=
.....
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: ilovealll=
izards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Friday, May 1=
9, 2000 6:53 PM
            Subject: Neo Beast Wars


            *Mantella=
 walks up to the Predacon base* Mantella: Hey, Let me in. I want a job!
